Graphin 取名意为 Graph Insight（图的分析洞察），是一个基于: Graphin is named Graph Insight. It is a G6-based React component library that focuses on relational visual analysis, simple and efficient, out of the box.
充分利用 React 框架特性，支持数据到视图的映射与变化: Take advantage of the React framework features to support data-to-view mapping and changes
内置丰富的布局，支持布局切换，满足不同场景下的布局需求: Built-in rich layout, support layout switching, to meet the layout needs of different scenarios
沉淀分析方法，内置分析组件，专注关系可视分析领域: Precipitation analysis method, built-in analysis component, focus on relational visual analysis
GraphinStudio 是基于 Graphin 开发的通用关系分析平台，具有: GraphinStudio is a universal relational analysis platform developed by Graphin with features such as relationship diffusion, relationship discovery, layout switching, etc.
